data.name: Mortgage Offset Account
data.description: A Mortgage Offset account reduces the amount of interest you pay on your home loan. The amount within this account is offset against your home loan, meaning you only pay interest on the difference.

features.additionalInfo: You can self-serve your day-to-day banking needs via Bank Australia's App, Internet Banking or Phone Banking.

fees.name: Offset Service Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged monthly for offset accounts that are linked to a non-package loan.
